name: Captain Collateral
description:
Those Robot Alien Squids really think they can just land here and indulge in some casual burst-them-all pastimes. No problem Captain Collateral is strong and is here to protect you. Well, that’s at least the theory…

Gameplay

  • Use your superpowers to annihilate the enemies.
  • Each time you get hit, your power (and irritation) levels go up.
  • Don’t get too angry or your powers will go OUT OF CONTROL and level the city!

Controls

  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Enjoy

Credits

 Made by the Dazzleberry Delight Team for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (“Out of Control” theme).

Credit also goes to the following content creators, thank you for making your work available!
